QuestData.Title: Ending the Inquisitor
QuestData.Description:
Inquisitor Vilhelm hides smugly in the back of the courtyard, flanked by several gargons and loyal venthyr.
We must kill him to break the ward on the Accuser's sinstone, so that Lord Chamberlain can use it in his battle.
Temel will once again help you penetrate the inquisitor's defenses. Do not tarry.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Powerful venthyr protecting the Accuser's sinstone.
QuestData.LogDescription: Order Temel to read from Inquisitor Vilhelm's sinstone, then kill him.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Echelon in the Halls of Atonement courtyard.
QuestData.RewardText: Lord Chamberlain confirmed the kill. We should hurry.
